Body:
Description: We need assistance setting up connections with Entra (for Entra ID Inventory), as well as Exchange Online, and Sharepoint online.

We have been working with Dusty - Upgraded to Netwrix Enterprise Audit 11.6.0.113 on 10/23/24.

The following jobs have been set up in zSandbox in preparation:
AADI_RegisterAzureAppAuth
EX_RegisterAzureAppAuth
SP_RegisterAzureAppAuth

What We've Learned Updated: Need to run these PS commands on the server hosting NEA:
#####
Install-Module -Name Az.Accounts

Install-Module Microsoft.Graph
#####
Next Steps Updated: 2024_1108: We must verify the other exchange permissions. (Tay C.)

2024_1108 - TASK TO DO for Mike: Make sure you create a spinoff ticket for Azure setup and close it (Tay).

(I want to review the meeting recording first.)
